nodes.excerpt: Want to replace annoying SMS 2FA codes? We verify your users by the way they type 4 words. This improves UX significantly and reduces costs by an order of magnitude. Btw: you can get the solution free of charge for a limited time. Check the website for more.
nodes.title: TypingDNA Verify - Replace SMS 2FA codes with better UX: just type 4 words
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 想取代恼人的短信2FA码？我们通过用户输入4个字的方式来验证你的用户。这大大改善了用户体验，并将成本降低了一个数量级。顺便说一下：您可以在有限的时间内免费获得该解决方案。查看网站了解更多。
localize.tagline: 用更好的用户体验取代短信2FA码：只需输入4个字即可。

localize.description: 想取代惱人的短信2FA碼？我們通過用戶輸入4個字的方式來驗證你的用戶。這大大改善了用戶體驗，並將成本降低了一個數量級。順便說一下：您可以在有限的時間內免費獲得該解決方案。查看網站了解更多。
localize.tagline: 用更好的用戶體驗取代短信2FA碼：只需輸入4個字即可。

nodes.excerpt: A playful, yellow page themed directory of brands that shows you which tools brands are using.

localize.tagline: 看看哪些工具正在为最好的D2C提供动力。

nodes.excerpt: Do you find yourself digging through email threads trying to find the version of a contract in which a specific change was introduced? Who proposed the change? Was it your lawyer, or your customer? If this pain is familiar, Version Story is here to help.
nodes.title: Version Story - Git for lawyers
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: 你是否发现自己在邮件中翻阅邮件线程，试图找到引入特定变更的合同版本？是谁提出的修改？是您的律师，还是您的客户？如果这种痛苦是熟悉的，版本故事在这里帮助你。
localize.tagline: 律师的Git

localize.description: 你是否發現自己在郵件中翻閱郵件線程，試圖找到引入特定變更的合同版本？是誰提出的修改？是您的律師，還是您的客戶？如果這種痛苦是熟悉的，版本故事在這裏幫助你。
localize.tagline: 律師的Git

nodes.excerpt: Charge Running is a mobile app that provides live running classes with others from all over the world! Trainers will update you on your stats and interact with you and your fellow runners in our real-time chat room.
nodes.title: Charge Running - Social running app with real-time coaching
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Charge Running是一款手机应用，它提供了与来自世界各地的其他人的实时跑步课程! 培训师会在我们的实时聊天室里更新你的数据，并与你和你的跑友互动。
localize.tagline: 实时指导的社交跑步应用

localize.description: Charge Running是一款手機應用，它提供了與來自世界各地的其他人的實時跑步課程! 培訓師會在我們的實時聊天室裏更新你的數據，並與你和你的跑友互動。
localize.tagline: 實時指導的社交跑步應用

nodes.excerpt: Highlight your Clubhouse event in social media. Paste the link of your event, and get a neat preview page you can share online.

localize.tagline: 在社交媒體上突出你的會所活動

nodes.excerpt: Turn your Slack Channel into a Blog Post with custom emojis. ■ Collaborative writing Write as you chat, and publish to the web ■ Easy to use If you know how to use slack, you are good to go ■ Custom emoji support Use emojis, defined in your slack workspace
nodes.title: Slog - Turn your Slack channel into a blog post
nodes.author: Kazushi Kawamura

localize.description: 用自定义表情符号将你的Slack频道变成博客文章。协作式写作 在聊天时书写，并发布到网络上 ■ 易于使用 如果您知道如何使用 slack，您就可以使用了 ■ 支持自定义表情符号 使用在您的 slack 工作区中定义的表情符号。
localize.tagline: 把你的Slack频道变成一篇博客文章

nodes.excerpt: End-to-end spend management for companies in LatAm. Issue unlimited physical or virtual cards, set limits for each, get real-time visibility of your team’s spend, and save valuable time on tedious tasks like invoice matching.
nodes.title: Clara - Clear, simplified spend management for companies in LatAm
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 拉美地区公司的端到端支出管理。发放无限的实体卡或虚拟卡，为每张卡设置限额，实时了解您团队的支出情况，并在发票匹配等繁琐任务上节省宝贵的时间。
localize.tagline: 为拉美地区的公司提供清晰、简化的支出管理。

localize.description: 拉美地區公司的端到端支出管理。發放無限的實體卡或虛擬卡，爲每張卡設置限額，實時瞭解您團隊的支出情況，並在發票匹配等繁瑣任務上節省寶貴的時間。
localize.tagline: 爲拉美地區的公司提供清晰、簡化的支出管理。

nodes.excerpt: This cloud-based tool will help you analyze your Facebook profile by providing detailed info on who is engaging with your posts! Find who is inactive and delete them with a few clicks. Easily automate friend's request process.
nodes.title: Friend Filter Pro - Remove inactive Facebook friends & know who unfollowed you
nodes.author: Gilbert Ondricka

localize.description: 这个基于云计算的工具将帮助你分析你的Facebook资料，提供关于谁在参与你的帖子的详细信息! 找到谁是不活跃的，并删除他们只需点击几下。轻松地自动处理朋友的请求过程。
localize.tagline: 删除不活跃的Facebook好友，知道谁取消了对你的关注。

localize.description: 這個基於雲計算的工具將幫助你分析你的Facebook資料，提供關於誰在參與你的帖子的詳細信息! 找到誰是不活躍的，並刪除他們只需點擊幾下。輕鬆地自動處理朋友的請求過程。
localize.tagline: 刪除不活躍的Facebook好友，知道誰取消了對你的關注。

nodes.excerpt: Send every customer a personalized onboarding checklist, with automated email reminders, assigned tasks, and a lot more. Upgrade that dusty spreadsheet and onboarding process you no longer love. Onboard your next customer with Arrows.
nodes.title: Arrows - Collaborative onboarding for high-touch customers
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 向每一位客户发送个性化的入职检查单，自动邮件提醒、分配任务等。升级你不再喜欢的尘封的电子表格和入职流程。用Arrows为您的下一位客户办理入职手续。
localize.tagline: 高接触客户的协同入职培训。

localize.description: 向每一位客戶發送個性化的入職檢查單，自動郵件提醒、分配任務等。升級你不再喜歡的塵封的電子表格和入職流程。用Arrows爲您的下一位客戶辦理入職手續。
localize.tagline: 高接觸客戶的協同入職培訓。

nodes.excerpt: Use data from your APIs, databases, or integrations to empower every team to grow your business’s bottom-line. Leverage OKRs and KPIs to cultivate a culture of accountability, transparency, and autonomy by focusing on your outcomes, not outputs.
nodes.title: Commonality - Turn your data into real results with KPIs and OKRs
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 使用来自您的 API、数据库或集成的数据，赋予每个团队权力，以增长您的业务底线。利用 OKR 和 KPI，通过关注您的结果而非产出，培养一种问责、透明和自主的文化。
localize.tagline: 通过KPI和OKR将数据转化为真实的结果。

localize.description: 使用來自您的 API、數據庫或集成的數據，賦予每個團隊權力，以增長您的業務底線。利用 OKR 和 KPI，通過關注您的結果而非產出，培養一種問責、透明和自主的文化。
localize.tagline: 通過KPI和OKR將數據轉化爲真實的結果。

nodes.excerpt: Tally is a new type of form builder. Just start typing and build forms for all purposes in seconds. Without knowing how to code, and for free!
nodes.title: Tally - The simplest way to create forms for free
nodes.author: Filip Minev

localize.description: Tally是一种新型的表单构建器。只需开始输入并在几秒钟内建立各种用途的表单。不需要知道如何编写代码，而且是免费的。
localize.tagline: 免费创建表格的最简单方法

localize.description: Tally是一種新型的表單構建器。只需開始輸入並在幾秒鐘內建立各種用途的表單。不需要知道如何編寫代碼，而且是免費的。
localize.tagline: 免費創建表格的最簡單方法

nodes.excerpt: B2B buyers are tired of the traditional sales process and want a B2C like buying experience. Deal Rooms transform your sales process to sell B2B buyers how they want to be sold. Open to close, deal rooms help your sales teams sell more and sell fast.
nodes.title: Referenceable - Deal rooms create B2C like buying experiences for B2B buyers
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: B2B买家已经厌倦了传统的销售流程，他们希望获得类似B2C的购买体验。Deal Rooms将改变您的销售流程，以B2B买家想要的方式进行销售。从开放到关闭，交易室帮助您的销售团队卖得更多，卖得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室为B2B买家创造类似B2C的购买体验

localize.description: B2B買家已經厭倦了傳統的銷售流程，他們希望獲得類似B2C的購買體驗。Deal Rooms將改變您的銷售流程，以B2B買家想要的方式進行銷售。從開放到關閉，交易室幫助您的銷售團隊賣得更多，賣得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室爲B2B買家創造類似B2C的購買體驗

nodes.excerpt: WellBuddy is a smart wellbeing tool that makes it easy and simple to focus on your health at work. ⠀ It integrates with your calendar and monitors and schedules physical and mental health breaks when you’re free so you can think, feel and perform better.
nodes.title: WellBuddy - Helping you find time to focus on your wellbeing at work
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: WellBuddy是一款智能健康工具，让您在工作中轻松简单地关注健康。⠀ 它与您的日历集成，并在您空闲时监控和安排身体和心理健康休息时间，以便您可以更好地思考、感受和执行。
localize.tagline: 帮助您找到时间专注于工作中的健康。

localize.description: WellBuddy是一款智能健康工具，讓您在工作中輕鬆簡單地關注健康。⠀ 它與您的日曆集成，並在您空閒時監控和安排身體和心理健康休息時間，以便您可以更好地思考、感受和執行。
localize.tagline: 幫助您找到時間專注於工作中的健康。

nodes.excerpt: Airdocs is a document generation service for Airtable. Create smart, beautiful-looking documents from your data. The drag-and-drop designer gives you ultimate control of your documents. Send your documents to another app or store them back in Airtable.
nodes.title: Airdocs - Generate documents from Airtable
nodes.author: Josh Mamroud

localize.description: Airdocs 是 Airtable 的文档生成服务。从您的数据中创建智能、美观的文档。拖放式设计器让您可以对文档进行终极控制。将您的文档发送到另一个应用程序或将它们存储回 Airtable 中。
localize.tagline: 从Airtable生成文件

localize.description: Airdocs 是 Airtable 的文檔生成服務。從您的數據中創建智能、美觀的文檔。拖放式設計器讓您可以對文檔進行終極控制。將您的文檔發送到另一個應用程序或將它們存儲回 Airtable 中。
localize.tagline: 從Airtable生成文件

nodes.excerpt: A new, flexible way to design your viral referral campaigns: we've just released a drag & drop page builder into UpViral, the platform to help grow your email list faster.

nodes.title: Milk Video - Turn webinars into designed video highlights in minutes

nodes.excerpt: Avo takes the busywork out of analytics with a guided workflow that catches errors and syncs across your existing tools (including Amplitude and Mixpanel). For people who are tired of spending more time managing their data than building great products.
nodes.title: Avo for PMs - Error proof your analytics
nodes.author: Stefania Olafsdottir

localize.description: Avo通过一个指导性的工作流程，捕捉错误并在现有的工具（包括Amplitude和Mixpanel）之间同步，将繁忙的工作从分析中解放出来。对于那些厌倦了花更多的时间来管理数据而不是建立伟大的产品的人来说。
localize.tagline: 防止您的分析错误

localize.description: Avo通過一個指導性的工作流程，捕捉錯誤並在現有的工具（包括Amplitude和Mixpanel）之間同步，將繁忙的工作從分析中解放出來。對於那些厭倦了花更多的時間來管理數據而不是建立偉大的產品的人來說。
localize.tagline: 防止您的分析錯誤

nodes.excerpt: Vidjet is a smart video player for websites. It uses a popup format to display videos, so you can segment and trigger them to your visitors. ⠀ It's also the easiest and fastest way to publish videos on a website! 🚀
nodes.title: Vidjet - Popup-video player for websites

localize.description: Vidjet是一款适用于网站的智能视频播放器。它使用弹出式格式来显示视频，因此您可以将视频分割并触发给您的访问者。⠀这也是在网站上发布视频的最简单、最快速的方式！ ⠀这也是在网站上发布视频的最简单、最快速的方式。🚀
localize.tagline: 网站的弹出式视频播放器

localize.description: Vidjet是一款適用於網站的智能視頻播放器。它使用彈出式格式來顯示視頻，因此您可以將視頻分割並觸發給您的訪問者。⠀這也是在網站上發佈視頻的最簡單、最快速的方式！ ⠀這也是在網站上發佈視頻的最簡單、最快速的方式。🚀
localize.tagline: 網站的彈出式視頻播放器

nodes.excerpt: All-In-One property management and sales automation platform for independent hotels and vacation rentals. We also help our properties upsell unsold rooms and amenities in a completely automated way via guest messaging and direct sales on website.

nodes.excerpt: Inbox Flows is a huge and growing library of emails from top brands that helps you research competitors and trends in your industry so you have a better idea of how to stand out in inboxes.

nodes.excerpt: Say goodbye to alt-tabbing for scattered resources and "productivity" tools TODAY. Typed⏎ is your one-and-only document workspace that streamlines research, drafting, communication and knowledge management. If Google Drives you crazy, get Typed⏎ now.
nodes.title: Typed⏎ Beta - Google Docs on Steroids
nodes.author: Trevor Owens

localize.description: 告别alt-tabbing分散的资源和 "生产力 "工具，今天。Typed⏎是您唯一的文档工作区，可简化研究、起草、沟通和知识管理。如果谷歌让你抓狂，现在就去买Typed⏎。
localize.tagline: Google Docs on Steroids

localize.description: 告別alt-tabbing分散的資源和 "生產力 "工具，今天。Typed⏎是您唯一的文檔工作區，可簡化研究、起草、溝通和知識管理。如果谷歌讓你抓狂，現在就去買Typed⏎。
localize.tagline: Google Docs on Steroids

nodes.excerpt: Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) are cutting-edge websites that behave like native apps. They're installable, fast, work offline, and open in their own native window. Pep turns your existing website into a PWA in one line of code.
nodes.title: Pep - Turn your site into a fast, installable Progressive Web App
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 渐进式网络应用(PWA)是表现得像本地应用的尖端网站。它们可以安装，快速，离线工作，并在自己的本地窗口中打开。Pep只需一行代码就能将您现有的网站变成一个PWA。
localize.tagline: 将您的网站变成一个快速的、可安装的渐进式网络应用。

localize.description: 漸進式網絡應用(PWA)是表現得像本地應用的尖端網站。它們可以安裝，快速，離線工作，並在自己的本地窗口中打開。Pep只需一行代碼就能將您現有的網站變成一個PWA。
localize.tagline: 將您的網站變成一個快速的、可安裝的漸進式網絡應用。
